title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.33 - Warning Signs and Plaques for Motorcyclists (W8-15, W8-15P, and W8-16)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.33 - Warning Signs and Plaques for Motorcyclists (W8-15, W8-15P, and W8-16)

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraph: Guidance: 02A Where the grooved, textured, or brick pavement exists
for a distance of 1000 feet or longer, the W8-15 sign should be supplemented
with a Distance plaque (see Section
2C.55
). Where additional signs are
placed within 1000 feet of the end of the pavement condition, the Distance
plaque should be omitted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2C.33

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
